homeWeb.description: GRTSINRY43's personal homepage, the source code of this site, rebuilt using Nuxt.js, implementing front-end SSR, SEO, some animation effects, and responsive design.

54shWeb.description: Reconstruction of the Central South University Youth League Committee website, using Bootstrap responsive design, implementing news display, video display, and some animation effects.

summerCheckin.description: A school project that enables students to check in via positioning, allows captains to check team members' attendance, and provides some basic data analysis.

privateProject: Internal use only, for private projects
internalOnly: Not deployed or internal use only
